name: missing-signer-check
description: Detects functions accepting AccountInfo without verifying is_signer

name: missing-owner-check
description: Detects deserialization of account data without verifying account.owner == program_id

name: integer-overflow
description: Detects unchecked arithmetic operations on integer types in Solana BPF programs

name: account-confusion
description: Detects manual account deserialization without 8-byte discriminator check

name: insecure-account-close
description: Detects account closure that zeros lamports but doesn't zero data and set discriminator

name: arbitrary-cpi
description: Detects invoke() or CpiContext::new() where the program target comes from untrusted input

name: pda-bump-misuse
description: Detects create_program_address() with user-provided bump seeds

name: unchecked-cpi-return
description: Detects CPI calls without error propagation via ? operator

name: cpi-reentrancy
description: Detects state mutations after CPI calls (CEI violation)

name: unsafe-pda-seeds
description: Detects PDA derivation with only static seeds (no user-specific components)

name: missing-rent-exempt
description: Detects create_account calls without Rent::get() or minimum_balance checks

name: cosmwasm-integer-overflow
description: Detects unchecked arithmetic on Uint128/Uint256 types

name: cosmwasm-reentrancy
description: Detects storage writes followed by add_message()/add_submessage() (CEI violation)

name: missing-sender-check
description: Detects ExecuteMsg match arms that mutate storage without checking info.sender

name: storage-collision
description: Detects duplicate storage prefix strings across Map::new() and Item::new() calls

name: unchecked-query-response
description: Detects querier results used without bounds or validity checks

name: improper-error-handling
description: Detects unwrap(), expect(), panic!() in entry point functions

name: unbounded-iteration
description: Detects .range() or .iter() without .take() in execute handlers

name: cosmwasm-missing-addr-validation
description: Detects Addr::unchecked() usage in non-test code

name: promise-reentrancy
description: Detects state mutation before Promise::new()/ext_*:: calls without #[private] callback guard

name: signer-vs-predecessor
description: Detects env::signer_account_id() used in access control instead of predecessor_account_id()

name: storage-staking-auth
description: Detects storage_deposit/storage_withdraw handlers without predecessor_account_id() check

name: callback-unwrap-usage
description: Detects #[callback_unwrap] attribute usage instead of #[callback_result]

name: near-wrapping-arithmetic
description: Detects wrapping_*/saturating_* on balance/amount variables that silently mask overflow

name: missing-private-callback
description: Detects public methods named on_* or *_callback without #[private] attribute

name: self-callback-state
description: Detects pending_* field writes before ext_self:: calls without guard checks

name: frontrunning-risk
description: Detects Promise::new().transfer() with user-provided parameters without commit-reveal patterns

name: unsafe-storage-keys
description: Detects storage key construction from user input via format!()

name: missing-deposit-check
description: Detects #[payable] methods that don't reference env::attached_deposit()

name: ink-reentrancy
description: Detects set_allow_reentry(true) which opens reentrancy attacks

name: ink-integer-overflow
description: Detects unchecked arithmetic on Balance/u128 types

name: ink-missing-caller-check
description: Detects #[ink(message)] functions with &mut self that write storage without verifying caller

name: ink-timestamp-dependence
description: Detects block_timestamp() usage in comparison or arithmetic expressions

name: ink-unbounded-storage
description: Detects .push() on Vec or .insert() on Mapping without a preceding length check

name: ink-cross-contract
description: Detects try_invoke() without ? or match on result

name: ink-panic-usage
description: Detects unwrap(), expect(), panic!() inside #[ink(message)] or #[ink(constructor)] functions

name: ink-result-suppression
description: Detects let _ = expr where expr returns Result, silently suppressing errors

name: ink-unsafe-delegate-call
description: Detects delegate_call with user-controlled code hash parameter

name: ink-missing-payable-check
description: Detects non-payable #[ink(message)] methods that reference transferred_value()

name: outdated-dependencies
description: Detects known-vulnerable dependency versions in Cargo.toml
